participants.name:

participants.description: Prisoner at Weyland-Yutani Corporation "Building Better Worlds"

messages.message:
Stein
indeed ... may i ask you why you want to  friend me ?

Brian
I'm divergent too.

Stein
explain to me  what that means  i have seen the movies   so i get it
but i would like to see your p o v
Point Of View

Brian
Yeah, I just relate the movies back to brainstorming: 
https://www.cleverism.com/idea-generation-divergent-vs-convergent-thinking/

Stein
ahh yes well i do belive that some  of us are  different
as in one who doesnt think as the mere mortals

Brian
But specifically related to the post on beatings, I don't tend to fall in line easily or trust easily.  I think that is the cause.

Stein
for you and i    "I am mortal and i know it "
mere mortals are those who think there is some specail place when they recycle
if they would read more  than one  book  written by some cave dwelling pedophile
and that   particular reference applies to all theism
if you want to brains trom  well lest figure out a way to  teach a man to fish  so to sepak
speak  not sepack
eg see with thier own eyes the flaw in thier logic as opposed to forcing our clear and untainted pov
im sure you must understand  where i am coming from
ever sen pac rim ?
then you can "catch my drift "

Brian
I thought that movie was good, looking forward to the second.

Stein
agreed
but the old school term of  do you catch my drift
is where they got the idea
catch my drift is  two minds as one      of the same thought  process
here is an example
if we had a mutual friend we both cared about as they were a good person
and then we find out they were horrribly wronged
one or the other could say  well  we should go pursuade somone not to do that again  to our  freind ....   catch my drift

Brian
http://www.word-detective.com/2010/03/drift-catch-my/
Which friend?

Stein
doesnt matter
any freind   lets jsut say that happened
the phrase catch my drift is   tow of a like mind
two
meaning instead of saying  this dude raped our friend  lets go fuck hism up  to teach him a lesson

Brian
vengeance is the only justice, batman taught me that.

Stein
venegnce  is best served both cold  and without knowlage of source
all they can have  is the suspicion
one must not be tired to  it
tied
the  idea is to instill a sence of fear   and intimidation
jsutice  but without direct involvment
well   semi direct
but as far as the rest of the world is aware
make the vengence appear as karma
hehe  remeber loosers  scum  evil eople arent very bright

Brian
interesting "make the vengence appear as karma"
I'm saving that.

Stein
no  you keep that to yourself
i mean it
or no more words of wisdom  for you
that is for YOU  and for YOU alone
you can thik it  but you may not speak it

Brian
Sure. I keep a journal.
My wife will love that.

Stein
ya well you msut  use an encrypted journal then

Brian
Google calendar?

Stein
no
temp  word file then send to a storage device

Brian
I think you are a genius.

Stein
that is isolated from all other
then delete all other  copies on your machine every day
in word its easy
or even a pdf form to make it more of a pain in the ass   for others to open
but always to a removeable media storage device
this is vital for personal thoughts and securities
if you wish to keep them in case you need to review them
they must be as secure as that   withn your own mnd
do you understand
i want your next response to condense all i said  with application to you  in short form
if you dont get it right i will correct you  but  i always give a person a shot to do it on thier own
